verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: slow] - [V: cooked] [ARG1: mesquite ribs] when we 're missing the grill during winter these tangy ribs give us that same smoky barbecue taste we love they 're so simple and fall - off - the - bone delicious too —sue evans marquette michigan
